node.name: FAB Defense Ruger 10/22 Collapsible Stock
node.short_description: The R10/22 M4 Collapsible Stock Conversion Kit from FAB Defense presents a high quality and ability enhancing tactical upgrade for the Ruger 10/22.
node.description:
The FAB Defense Ruger 10/22 Collapsible Stock Conversion Kit is a high quality and ability-enhancing tactical upgrade for the Ruger 10/22.

This unique stock offers the perfect combination of a classic bench-rest design with a modern tactical versatility and buttstock features.

 

Ruger 10/22 Collapsible Stock Advantages:

1913 MIL-STD Picatinny side and lower rails
Allow secure mounting of any Picatinny based accessories
Quick and easy drop-in installation
Collapsible buttstock system with 5 length options
Side folding buttstock (left folding by default) for compact carry and storage
Quick-Detach sling swivel sockets on both sides
Ergonomic design prevents wrist fatigue and ensures secure grip
Finger grooves and backstrap shape improves trigger operation
Durable and lightweight fiberglass reinforced polymer construction
Incorporates a 25 years limited lifetime warranty

 

Ruger 10/22 Collapsible Stock Compatibility:

Standard and bull barreled Ruger速 10/22速 rifles
All 1913 MIL-STD picatinny based accessories

node.name: FAB Defense Ruger 10/22 Precision Stock
node.short_description: The R10/22 UAS Precision Stock Conversion Kit from FAB Defense presents a high quality and ability enhancing upgrade for the Ruger 10/22.
node.description:
The FAB Defense Ruger R10/22 UAS Precision Stock Conversion Kit is a high quality and ability-enhancing upgrade for the Ruger 10/22.

This unique stock offers the perfect combination of a classic bench-rest design with a modern tactical versatility and buttstock features.

 

Ruger 10/22 Precision Stock Advantages:

1913 MIL-STD Picatinny side and lower rails
Allow secure mounting of any Picatinny based accessories
Quick and easy drop-in installation
Built-in adjustable cheek-rest with 5 height options
Side folding buttstock (left folding by default) for compact carry and storage
Quick-Detach sling swivel sockets on both sides
Ergonomic design prevents wrist fatigue and ensures secure grip
Finger grooves and backstrap shape improves trigger operation
Durable and lightweight fiberglass reinforced polymer construction
Incorporates a 25 years limited lifetime warranty

 

Ruger 10/22 Precision Stock Compatibility:

Standard and bull barreled Ruger速 10/22速 rifles
